item.title: Optimization
item.author: invalid@example.com (TryXy)
item.dc:creator: TryXy
item.content:encoded: Anyone know how to fix lw totally lagging ur game? Ive used plent of cheats it never dropped a single one of my fps, when i inject lw instantly drops to 1-2 fps. Its not my pc, because i can run way bigger games on max graphics and get like 150 fps. I have to reinject about 5 times to get atleast some fps. If anyone knows a fix please reply. Thanks

item.title: Cheat crashing
item.author: invalid@example.com (mvrtins)
item.dc:creator: mvrtins
item.content:encoded:
Hello fellow Legendware users and Staff, I can't play with Legendware today for no reason, I inject the cheat and then I join a server (without loading configs or anything at all) and I just crash. I could play with Legendware literally like yesterday so can anyone tell me what is going on?

P.S.: I don't know if this has any correlation at all to the crashes but it started happening only after I played Legacy HvH. It also doesn't crash if I join the same server I tried without cheats so...
